subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Murphy is downright dangerous, and endearing, as evidenced by Game 5 of the National League division series. The hope is that the Mets will reward him with a new contract next year.
snippet: The Mets’ Murphy is downright dangerous, and endearing, as evidenced by Game 5 of the National League division series. The hope is that the Mets will reward him with a new contract next year.
